snippet.title: Mansion At Midnight | Early Access Trailer | Indie horror game
snippet.description:
Coming to Steam October 20th, 2023
Just in time for Halloween, come play Mansion At Midnight a free indie horror game by Game Grotto!

Mansion at Midnight is a survival horror game where your friends may not be what they seem. The front doors to the mansion are locked, and you will need to explore looking for weapons and magical items to defend yourself. Be warned, during your search you and your friends may fall victim to an item that is cursed. The unfortunate soul who picks up this cursed item will be transformed into one of five powerful and terrifying creatures. At this point, you must defeat your new adversary, mysteriously opening the front door upon their defeat. Was the house only keeping you inside for its cruel amusement?

#horrorgaming #indiegames #indiehorror #gametrailers
